Data Policy Questions | Facebook 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Help Center English (US) Data Policy Questions What is your Data Policy question about? What kinds of information does Facebook collect? How does Facebook use the information it collects? How does Facebook share the information it collects? How do the Facebook Companies work together? How can I manage or delete information about me? How does Facebook respond to legal requests or prevent harm? How do Facebook's global services operate? How will Facebook notify me of changes to its Data Policy? We’d like to be able to get in touch with you. Please provide your name and a contact email address so that we’re able to respond to your question. Your Full Name Your Email  If you are a California resident and would like to exercise your California consumer privacy rights, please submit your request through one of our  designated CCPA methods .  vertical report_type Send English (US) Español Français (France) 中文(简体) العربية Português (Brasil) 한국어 Italiano Deutsch हिन्दी 日本語  Facebook © 2021 About Ad Choices Terms & Policies Privacy Create Ad Cookies Careers Create Page
